name: expo-lite-data-store
author: QinIndexCode
description:
A lite data store for Expo; 
 Detail in https://github.com/QinIndexCode/expo-lite-data-store please don't use 1.0.0 version because it's not stable. In this version , fix crypto compatibility issue.
versionDescription: fix crypto compatibility issue and add config generation tool

scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { const { ConfigGenerator } = require('./dist/js/utils/configGenerator'); ConfigGenerator.generateConfig(process.cwd()); } catch(e) { console.log('配置文件生成失败:', e.message); }"
